TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SearchResult extends System.Object

summary.span: クラスは、 を使用した検索中に返される Active Directory ドメイン サービス階層のノードをカプセル化します。

span.span: The class encapsulates a node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy that is returned during a search through .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry() cil managed

summary.span: Active Directory ドメイン サービス階層から に対応する を取得します。

span.span: Retrieves the that corresponds to the from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用を通じて返されたエントリではなく、ライブのエントリを確認したい場合、返されたオブジェクトでメソッドを呼び出す場合またはします。Use when you want to look at the live entry instead of the entry that was returned through , or when you want to invoke a method on the object that was returned. > [!NOTE] > 呼び出す各によって返される低速にすることができます。Calling on each returned through can be slow. ## Examples 次の例は、抜粋の例では、します。The following example is an excerpt of the example in . 元の例では、作成、新しいオブジェクトを使用して目的のパス、検索を開始する方法。The original example creates a new object with the desired path and uses the method to initiate the search. この例では、検索を実行した後、検索結果で指定されているライブのディレクトリ エントリを取得します。After performing the search, the example uses the method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results. ```vb ' Get the 'DirectoryEntry' that corresponds to 'mySearchResult'. Dim myDirectoryEntry As DirectoryEntry = mySearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry() Console.WriteLine(ControlChars.Newline + "The name of the 'myDirectoryEntry' " + _ "directory entry that corresponds to the " + _ "'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}" + _ ControlChars.Newline, myDirectoryEntry.Name) ``` ```csharp // Get the 'DirectoryEntry' that corresponds to 'mySearchResult'. DirectoryEntry myDirectoryEntry = mySearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry(); Console.WriteLine("\nThe name of the 'myDirectoryEntry' " + "directory entry that corresponds to the " + "'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}\n", myDirectoryEntry.Name); ``` ```cpp# // Get the 'DirectoryEntry' that corresponds to 'mySearchResult'. DirectoryEntry^ myDirectoryEntry = mySearchResult->GetDirectoryEntry(); Console::WriteLine( String::Concat("\nThe name of the 'myDirectoryEntry' ", "directory entry that corresponds to the ", "'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}\n"), myDirectoryEntry->Name); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Path As String
public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks プロパティは、Active Directory Domain Services 階層で、このエントリを一意に識別します。The property uniquely identifies this entry in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. 常にこのパスを使用して、エントリを取得できます。The entry can always be retrieved using this path. ## Examples 次の例は、抜粋の例では、します。The following example is an excerpt of the example in . 元の例では、作成、新しいオブジェクトを使用して目的のパス、検索を開始する方法。The original example creates a new object with the desired path and uses the method to initiate the search. この例では、検索を実行した後、検索結果で指定されているライブのディレクトリ エントリを取得します。After performing the search, the example uses the method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results. この例では、解析、の検索結果からのプロパティ。This example shows how to parse the property from the search result. ```vb Dim mySearchResultPath As String = mySearchResult.Path Console.WriteLine("The path for the 'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}" + _ ControlChars.Newline, mySearchResultPath) ``` ```csharp string mySearchResultPath = mySearchResult.Path; Console.WriteLine("The path for the 'mySearchResult' search " + "result is : {0}\n", mySearchResultPath); ``` ```cpp# String^ mySearchResultPath = mySearchResult->Path; Console::WriteLine("The path for the 'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}\n", mySearchResultPath); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Properties As ResultPropertyCollection

summary.span: このオブジェクトのプロパティの コレクションを取得します。

span.span: Gets a collection of properties for this object.

value.span: オブジェクトに設定されたプロパティの 。

span.span: A of properties set on this object.
